name: Tools
description: Artisan's tools, gaming sets, musical instruments, and other tools from the SRD

items.name: Alchemist's Supplies
items.description: These supplies include beakers, chemicals, flasks, funnels, and a variety of other materials used to create alchemical substances. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to identify alchemical substances or create alchemical items.

items.name: Brewer's Supplies
items.description: These supplies include a large glass jug, hops, a siphon, and several feet of tubing. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to brew alcoholic beverages.

items.name: Calligrapher's Supplies
items.description: These supplies include ink, a dozen sheets of parchment, and three quills. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to produce decorative writing or identify documents.

items.name: Carpenter's Tools
items.description: These tools include a saw, a hammer, nails, a hatchet, a square, a ruler, an adze, a plane, and a chisel. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to craft wooden objects or structures.

items.name: Cartographer's Tools
items.description: These tools include a quill, ink, parchment, a pair of compasses, calipers, and a ruler. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to draw or interpret maps.

items.name: Cobbler's Tools
items.description: These tools include a hammer, an awl, a knife, a shoe stand, a cutter, spare leather, and thread. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to craft or repair footwear.

items.name: Cook's Utensils
items.description: These utensils include a metal pot, knives, forks, a stirring spoon, and a ladle. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to prepare food.

items.name: Glassblower's Tools
items.description: These tools include a blowpipe, a small marver, blocks, and tweezers. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to create glass objects.

items.name: Jeweler's Tools
items.description: These tools include a small saw and hammer, files, pliers, and tweezers. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to appraise or work with gems and jewelry.

items.name: Leatherworker's Tools
items.description: These tools include a knife, a small mallet, an edger, a hole punch, thread, and leather scraps. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to craft or repair leather goods.

items.name: Mason's Tools
items.description: These tools include a trowel, a hammer, a chisel, brushes, and a square. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to work with stone or brick.

items.name: Painter's Supplies
items.description: These supplies include an easel, canvas, paints, brushes, charcoal sticks, and a palette. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to create paintings or visual art.

items.name: Potter's Tools
items.description: These tools include potter's needles, ribs, scrapers, a knife, and calipers. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to craft ceramic objects.

items.name: Smith's Tools
items.description: These tools include hammers, tongs, charcoal, rags, and a whetstone. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to forge metal objects.

items.name: Tinker's Tools
items.description: These tools include a variety of hand tools, thread, needles, a whetstone, scraps of cloth and leather, and a small pot of glue. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to repair everyday objects or create small mechanical devices.

items.name: Weaver's Tools
items.description: These tools include thread, needles, and scraps of cloth. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to craft or repair textiles.

items.name: Woodcarver's Tools
items.description: These tools include a knife, a gouge, and a small saw. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to carve wood.

items.name: Dice Set
items.description: A set of dice for gambling games. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play games with dice.

items.name: Dragonchess Set
items.description: A three-dimensional chess variant played on three boards. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play dragonchess.

items.name: Playing Card Set
items.description: A deck of cards for various games. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play card games.

items.name: Three-Dragon Ante Set
items.description: A popular gambling card game. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play Three-Dragon Ante.

items.name: Bagpipes
items.description: A wind instrument with a bag and pipes. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play music with this instrument.

items.name: Drum
items.description: A percussion instrument. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play music with this instrument.

items.name: Dulcimer
items.description: A stringed instrument played by striking the strings with small hammers. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play music with this instrument.

items.name: Flute
items.description: A woodwind instrument. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play music with this instrument.

items.name: Lute
items.description: A stringed instrument, popular among bards. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play music with this instrument.

items.name: Lyre
items.description: A small stringed instrument held in the arms while played. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play music with this instrument.

items.name: Horn
items.description: A brass wind instrument. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play music with this instrument.

items.name: Pan Flute
items.description: A set of pipes of varying lengths bound together. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play music with this instrument.

items.name: Shawm
items.description: A double-reed woodwind instrument with a loud, piercing tone. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play music with this instrument.

items.name: Viol
items.description: A bowed stringed instrument. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to ability checks you make to play music with this instrument.

items.name: Disguise Kit
items.description: This pouch of cosmetics, hair dye, and small props lets you create disguises that change your physical appearance. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to create a visual disguise.

items.name: Forgery Kit
items.description: This small box contains papers, parchments, inks, and seals. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to create a physical forgery of a document.

items.name: Herbalism Kit
items.description: This kit contains pouches for storing herbs, clippers and leather gloves for collecting plants, a mortar and pestle, and several glass jars. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to identify or apply herbs and to create potions of healing.

items.name: Navigator's Tools
items.description: This set includes a sextant, a compass, calipers, a ruler, parchment, ink, and a quill. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to chart a course or navigate.

items.name: Poisoner's Kit
items.description: This kit includes vials, chemicals, and other equipment necessary for the creation of poisons. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to craft or use poisons.

items.name: Thieves' Tools
items.description: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.

items.name: Vehicles (Land)
items.description: Proficiency with land vehicles covers a wide range of options, from chariots and howdahs to wagons and carts. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to control or navigate land vehicles in difficult circumstances.

items.name: Vehicles (Water)
items.description: Proficiency with water vehicles covers all waterborne vessels, from rowboats to sailing ships. Proficiency allows you to add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to control or navigate water vehicles in difficult circumstances.
